Elf-maiden]] of [[Doriath]], who lived in the woods near [[Menegroth]]. At the bidding of [[Melian]], she became the friend and tutor of [[Túrin]] during his boyhood years in Doriath. It was from Nellas' teaching that Túrin gained the Elf-like bearing and knowledge of [[Sindarin]] that led the people of [[Nargothrond]] to give him the name [[Adanedhel]], ''Elf-Man''.
